entry.title: Editor - document #151: draft-gwdi-nsi-framework-v2-draft10
entry.content:
• Status changed from submitted to public comment
  • Assignee changed from Richard Hughes-Jones to Andre Merzky

Thanks for this submission. We will go ahead with a 30-day public comment. Please solicit comments from your constituents. Brief affirmative comments are welcome, as well as more substantive comments.

I believe this will "obsolete" #173, not "supersede" it.

Andre, would you please create a public comment tracker, and then I can announce it? Thank you,
-- Greg

entry.title: Editor - document #151: draft-gwdi-nsi-framework-v2-draft10
entry.content:
• Assignee changed from Andre Merzky to Greg Newby

The public comment tracker is now created at http://redmine.ogf.org/projects/editor-pubcom/boards/20 . Sorry for the delay!

entry.title: Editor - document #151: draft-gwdi-nsi-framework-v2-draft10
entry.content:
• Status changed from public comment to author action
  • Assignee changed from Greg Newby to Guy Roberts

Public comment period has completed. Reassign to authors to process any comments received, and the AD should also check that public comments have adequately been recruited and addressed.

entry.title: Editor - document #151: draft-gwdi-nsi-framework-v2-draft10
entry.content:
• File gwdi-nsi-framework-v2.pdf added

The attached document has been corrected with feedback as requested by reviewers:
- 'obsolete' used
- removed repetitious references to the service types supported
- removed repetitious reverenced to the RA/PA/AG variants of the NSA

The document has now also been through our technical writer to remove any typos, and check consistency of use and referencing of acronyms.

We would like this document to be published.

Thanks,
Guy

entry.title: Editor - document #151: draft-gwdi-nsi-framework-v2-draft10
entry.content:
• Status changed from author action to final review
  • Assignee changed from Guy Roberts to Greg Newby

entry.title: Editor - document #151: draft-gwdi-nsi-framework-v2-draft10
entry.content:
• Status changed from final review to to be published

Thank you for this. It is ready for publication as GFD-I.208.

Please upload editable source. Andre will then affix the final header/footer, and push for publication. Greg will then announce it.

Thanks for the authors/editors for efforts on this document.
- Greg

Hi Andre,

As requested, please find .doc version attached.

Thanks,
Guy
